text: The 1956 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 23rd edition of the women's singles championship. Tomi Okawa defeated Kiiko Watanabe in the final by three sets to two, to win the title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1956 in women's table tennis
title: 1956 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
